programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.title: Total Dramarama

programme.desc: Wrth fynd allan i'r mr, mae Twt a Tanwen yn dod o hyd i forfil yn sownd yn y rhew. Twt and Tanwen come across a whale stuck in the ice. How will they free him?

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn l gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Fun with characters like Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Pobeth, Dani Rheolaeth, Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa and Delyth Dylwythen.

programme.title: New: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn tybio bod artist wedi paentio patrwm sgwiglyd ar do Tomi. Ond ma nhw'n dysgu mwy am wlithod! The Woohoos wonder who on earth has painted a squiggly pattern on Scotty's roof?

programme.title: Sion y Chef
programme.desc: Mae'r pentrefwyr yn helpu Magi gasglu cnwd o fefus. Yn anffodus, wedi damwain gyda phl droed, mae'r mefus yn cael eu malu. A mishap with a football results in Magi's fruits being crushed.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym mhentre Pontypandy heddiw? What's happening in Pontypandy today?

programme.title: Octonots
programme.desc: Wedi i Cregynnog a Harri gael damwain, maen nhw'n cael help gan Lysywen Farus a physgodyn Grwper. Cregynnog and Harri crash their Gups and need some help from an eel and a grouper fish.

programme.title: New: Help Llaw
programme.desc: A bookshelf has broken in Carmarthen library; Harry goes to help Gruff and Yvonne fix it. Yn llyfrgell Caerfyrddin, ma silff lyfrau wedi torri - ffwrdd a Harri i helpu Yvonne a Gruff.

programme.title: Cymylaubychain
programme.desc: Amser stori yw un o hoff amserau Bobo Gwyn o'r dydd a heddiw mae'n clywed stori sy'n tanio'i ddychymyg! Bobo Gwyn loves storytime and today he hears a story which fires his imagination.

programme.title: Digbi Draig
programme.desc: Mae Cochyn yn cael ei ddiarddel o'r Clwb Trn gan Conyn. Yn annisgwyl mae'n dod yn ffrind i Glenys sydd yn ei wahodd i ymuno 'i Chlwb Cnau. Cochyn is ejected from The Train Club by Conyn.

programme.title: Caru Canu a Stori
programme.desc: Stori am ddau gi bach direidus, sydd wrth eu bodd yn gwisgo esgidiau, sydd gan Cari i ni heddiw. Today, Cari tells the tale of two mischievous dogs, who love wearing shoes.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae Ben a'r Abadas yn chwarae Gem y Geiriau. Mae'r gair newydd i'w ganfod yn y ty. Tybed beth yw e? Ben and the Abadas play The Word Game. Today's word can be found in the house. What is it?

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth i blant bach gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends.

programme.title: Y Tralalas
programme.desc: Mae Harmoni, Melodi a Bop yn mynd i ganol y coed a'r planhigion yn y jwngl. Mae'r Tralalas yn cael hwyl yn siglo ar y coed! The crew go to the jungle to marvel at trees and plants galore.

programme.title: Blero yn Mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Mae angen atgyweirio Pont Gylch ond wrth baratoi i wneud hynny aiff Sim yn sownd mewn gwe pry cop! Blero helps his friends mend Pont Gylch but along the way Sim gets in a sticky situation.

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc, a chath yn coginio cacen! Welcome to a new series of Jambor!

programme.title: Joni Jet
programme.desc: Mae Jet-fam yn gyrru Jetboi ar dasgau "diflas". Ond, o dipyn i beth, mae'n sylweddoli mai hyfforddiant ar gyfer ei dasg bwysicaf eto oedd y cyfan. Jet-mom drives Jet-boy on "boring" errands.

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
programme.desc: Timau o Ysgol Bro Eirwg sy'n ymuno Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Bro Eirwg join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

programme.title: Yr Whws
programme.desc: Mae'r Whws yn darganfod olion traed MAWR ac ma' nhw eisiau gwybod i ba greadur anhygoel maen nhw'n perthyn. The Woohoos discover some BIG muddy footprints footprints - who do they belong to?

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Mae Norman yn awyddus i gael sgwp ar y papur lleol, ond fel arfer ma pethau'n mynd o chwith!! Norman is keen to get a scoop in the local paper but, as usual, things go wrong!!

programme.title: Cacamwnci
programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci nl gyda chymeriadau newydd fel Iestyn Ymestyn, Tesni Trwsio Popeth, Dani Rheolaeth, a'r hen ffefrynnau: Plismon Preis, Vanessa drws nesa a Delyth Dylwythen. Cacamwnci is back!

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Dechrau'r cystadlu a'r holl newyddion a gwybodaeth angenrheidiol ar bedwerydd fore'r Wyl. The start of the competitions plus all the news and information on the festival's fourth morning.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Cystadlaethau'r disgyblion ysgolion uwchradd o'r pafiliynau, a'r canlyniadau diweddaraf o Lwyfan y Cyfrwy gyda Mari Lovgreen. The secondary school pupils' competitions from the pavilions.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Seremoni'r Dydd: Y Cadeirio
programme.desc: Darllediad byw o brif Seremoni'r dydd, sef Defod y Cadeirio. The highlight of the day - a live broadcast of the main ceremony, the Chairing Ceremony.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Gweddill cystadlaethau'r disgyblion ysgolion uwchradd yng nghwmni Trystan ac Heledd. The rest of the secondary school pupils' competitions, plus Alun Williams wanders the Eisteddfod field.

programme.title: Cysgu o Gwmpas
programme.desc: Trip i'r brifddinas sy'n galw'r tro ma wrth i Beti a Huw aros yn Parador 44, gwesty a redir gan deulu'r Owens. This time: a trip to family hotel, Parador 44.and a pop-in to Clwb Ifor Bach.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Mae Mei Emrys yma wrth iddo ryddhau ei sengl newydd, ac edrychwn ymlaen at benwythnos o bel-droed i fenywod Cymru. Mei Emrys is here & we look forward to a weekend of Welsh womens football.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Iau yr Eisteddfod, ac mae Lily Beau hefyd yma yn crwydro'r maes. Highlights of Thursday's Urdd Eisteddfod, and Lily Beau is also here roaming and reporting from the field.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Pawb a'i Farn
programme.desc: Rhaglen o Eisteddfod yr Urdd Dur a Mor Parc Margam gyda Sioned Williams AS Plaid Cymru, Callum Higgins Llafur Cymru a'r gomediwraig Mel Owen. Special from the Urdd Eisteddfod in Margam Park.

programme.title: Amour & Mynydd
programme.desc: Mae cyfnod y criw yn y chalet yn dod i ben, ac mae Sion a Nicola, y ddau aelod newydd, yn trefnu det yn y twba twym. It's almost time to leave, and the gang climb France's highest Ice Tower.

programme.title: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Iau yr Eisteddfod, ac mae Lily Beau hefyd yma yn crwydro'r maes. Highlights of Thursday's Urdd Eisteddfod, and Lily Beau is also here roaming and reporting from the field.

programme.title: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Iau yr Eisteddfod, ac mae Lily Beau hefyd yma yn crwydro'r maes. Highlights of Thursday's Urdd Eisteddfod, and Lily Beau is also here roaming and reporting from the field.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Home Shopping.

programme.title: ..programmes start at 6.00am
programme.desc: ..programmes start at 6.00am

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Dewch i gwrdd 'r criw printio - Melyn, Gwyrddlas a Majenta! Meet the Printing Crew - Yellow, Cyan and Magenta!

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Dewch ar antur gyda ni i gwrdd ac anifeiliaid bach y byd, ac yn y rhaglen hon byddwn yn dod i nabod yr arth wen a'r mircat. In this programme, we get to know the polar bear and the meercat.

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Mae Guto a'i ffrindiau'n mynd ar antur i flasu'r blodau dant y llew melysaf yn y byd. Guto and his friends set out to taste the sweetest dandelions in the world.

programme.title: Ahoi!
programme.desc: Pwy fydd y mr-ladron sy'n ymuno Ben Dant a Cadi i herio'r byd y tro 'ma? From which school will these pirates come, to join Ben Dant and Cadi for a little adventure?

programme.title: Odo
programme.desc: Cartwn hyfryd am gwdihw bach o'r enw Odo a'i ffrindiau yn y goedwig. Lovely cartoon about a little owl called Odo and his woodland friends.

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Mae gan Pablo ei ffordd ei hun o weld y byd. Heddiw: ofn lifft y siop bob dim! Mae'n rhaid iddo fo a'r anifeiliaid drio lledfu eu hofn. Pablo is scared of the lift at the department store.

programme.title: Ein Byd Bach...
programme.desc: Tro hwn, cawn edrych ar sut mae technoleg wedi newid ein bywydau, gan wneud pethau yn haws ac yn fwy cyfleus nag erioed o'r blaen. We look at how technology at home has changed our lives.

programme.title: Pentre Papur Pop
programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae Huwcyn yn mynd i wneud sioe hud a lledrith gwych! On today's poptastic adventure, Hooper is putting on a spectacular magic show!

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel a Guto eisiau gwybod o ble mae ml yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd nhw i Fferm Fach am dro ac am wers. Nel and Guto want to know where Honey comes from.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Beth sydd yna i'w wneud yn y parc pan mae'r eira yn toddi? Mae Fflwff wrth ei fodd efo'r plu eira! What can you do in the park after the snow melts? Fflwff flies with the snowflakes!

programme.title: Stiw
programme.desc: Mae Stiw'n penderfynu bod yn frenin ar ei deyrnas ei hun, "Stiw-dir". Stiw declares the home and garden "Stiw-dir" and makes himself king.

programme.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
programme.desc: Mae swn rhyfedd yn dod o do ty Cyw ac mae'r criw'n grediniol bod 'na ysbryd yn y to. There's a strange noise coming from the roof of Cyw's house and the crew are convinced it's a ghost!

programme.title: Patrol Pawennau
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd y cwn bach heddiw? What's happening in the Paw Patrol world today?

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw bydd Meleri a chriw o ffrindiau yn cael hwyl yn Fferm Folly, awn ni am dro gyda Iestyn a'i deulu lan Moel Famau, a bydd Huw yn cael antur gyda Seth ac Aron. Today fun in Folly Farm!

programme.title: Caru Canu
programme.desc: Hwiangerdd draddodiadol am lwynog coch yn cysgu ac yna'n deffro'n barod am ddiwrnod hyfryd. A traditional lullaby about a red fox sleeping soundly before waking up, ready for another day.

programme.title: Twm Twrch
programme.desc: Mae Dorti a Twm Twrch yn mynd ar daith i ddarganfod beth yw'r golau rhyfedd a welodd Twm Twrch. Dorti and Twm Twrch go on a mission to find out what the strange light Twm Twrch saw.

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Mae'r Dreigiau yn ailgylchu hen ddillad i addurno'r orsaf ar gyfer priodas. The Dragons recycle old clothes to decorate the station for a wedding.

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan ma Crawc yn darganfod ei fod yn perthyn i'r teulu brenhinol mae ei ymddygiad yn mynd ar nerfau pawb. Crawc finds he's related to royalty, but his airs and graces offend his friends.

programme.title: Kim a Cai a Cranc
programme.desc: Ymunwch Kim a Cai ar antur hudolus a chwareus wrth iddyn nhw chwilio am gragen newydd i Cranc! Join Kim and Cai on a magical adventure as they search for a new shell for Cranc!

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae Pinc hywliog yn cyrraedd Gwlad y Lliwiau. Fun Pink arrives in Colourland.

programme.title: Anifeiliaid Bach y Byd
programme.desc: Awn i'r goedwig law i gwrdd 'r Broga Dart Gwenwynig ac i waelod y mor i gwrdd 'r Chwyddbysgodyn a'r Pysgodyn Llew. We meet the Poison Dart Frog, the Puffa Fish and the Lion Fish.

programme.title: Fferm Fach
programme.desc: Mae Nel eisiau gwybod o ble mae afalau yn dod. Felly, mae Hywel, y ffermwr hud, yn mynd hi i Fferm Fach er mwyn dangos hud ffermio go iawn iddi. Nel wants to know where Apples come from.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Dechrau'r cystadlu a'r holl newyddion a gwybodaeth angenrheidiol ar bumed fore'r Wyl. The start of the competitions along with all the news and information on the festival's fifth morning.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.title: New: Seremoni'r Dydd: Y Coroni
programme.desc: Uchafbwynt y dydd ar faes yr Eisteddfod - darllediad byw o brif Seremoni'r dydd sef Defod y Coroni. Highlight of the day - live broadcast of the main event of the day, the Crowning Ceremony.

programme.title: New: Eisteddfod yr Urdd 2025
programme.desc: Gweddill cystadlaethau disgyblion hyn yr ysgolion uwchradd, ac mae Alun Williams yn crwydro'r maes ar barc gwledig Margam. The rest of the competitions for older secondary school pupils.

programme.title: Garddio a Mwy
programme.desc: Mae Meinir wrth ei bodd yn croesawu Sioned ag Adam i Bant y Wennol. Adam advises Meinir on using vegetables in an ornamental border, and Sioned creates an interesting display using mint.

programme.title: New: Heno
programme.desc: Ry' ni'n fyw o Wyl Triban ac yn edrych ymlaen at ddigwyddiad Ti a Fi Mwyaf y Byd. We're live from Triban Festival and look forward to the biggest Ti a Fi event.

programme.title: Newyddion S4C
programme.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau Dydd Gwener Eisteddfod yr Urdd, a bydd Lily Beau yn crwydro'r maes. Friday highlights from the Urdd Eisteddfod, plus Lily Beau will be roaming and reporting from the field.

programme.desc: Uchafbwyntiau gm Cynghrair y Menywod UEFA rhwng Denmarc a Chymru. Parc Nature Energy. UEFA Women's Nations League game highlights between Denmark and Wales. Nature Energy Park, Odense.

programme.title: Der' Dramor 'Da Fi!
programme.desc: Ma' pedwar person sydd erioed wedi cwrdd yn teithio i'r Algarve i gystadlu gyda'u diwrnod delfrydol nhw. Four strangers travel to the Algarve and compete with their own special daytrips.

programme.title: Blind Rage
programme.desc: 1978. Action. Directed by Efren C. Pion. Stars Tony Ferrer, Leo Fong, Fred Williamson & Leila Hermosa. Five unstoppable blind men are recruited to steal $15 million in secret CIA loot. [S]

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: 1985. Adventure. Director: George Miller. Stars Christopher Reeve, Rosanna Arquette & Sam Wanamaker. A mail pilot and a rich man's daughter get stranded in the mountains after their plane crashes. [S]

programme.title: The Man Who Changed His Name
programme.desc: 1934. Drama. Lyn Harding plays Shelby Clive, who has been obliged to shorten his last name so that he won't be confused with a notorious (and never-apprehended) wife murderer. [S]

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: The Case of the Split Ticket. 1954. Starring: Ronald Howard, Howard Marion-Crawford & Archie Duncan. When O'Casey wins the lottery, they must find Albert before the ticket runs out. [S]

programme.title: Love from a Stranger
programme.desc: 1937. Drama. Stars Ann Harding, Basil Rathbone & Binnie Hale. A lottery winner breaks up with her fianc and marries a fortune hunter who proves to be dangerous. [S]

programme.title: King of the Underworld
programme.desc: 1952. Crime. Director: Victor M. Gover. Stars Tod Slaughter, Patrick Barr and Tucker McGuire. A crook is implicated in blackmail, greed for emeralds, a secret formula and murder. [S]

programme.title: Bob's Your Uncle
programme.desc: 1942. Comedy. Directed by Oswald Mitchell. Stars Albert Modley, Wally Patch, H.F.Maltby & Johnnie Schofield. British Comedy that follows the adventures of enthusiastic members of the Home Guard. [S]

programme.title: Send For Paul Temple
programme.desc: 1946. Crime Drama. Directed by John Argyle. Starring Anthony Hulme and Joy Shelton. Scotland Yard calls in novelist and amateur detective Paul Temple to help track down a gang of diamond robbers. [S]

programme.title: Battle of the V1
programme.desc: 1958. War. Director: Vernon Sewell. Stars Michael Rennie, Patricia Medina & Christopher Lee. Polish Resistance discover a mysterious pilot-less plane. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Long Haired Leftie - Part 1. 1973. Stars William Mervyn, Ron Pember & David Calder. Semi-professional agitator Donald Dowd faces an illegal picketing charge and has chosen trial by jury. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Long Haired Leftie - Part 2. 1973. Stars David Calder & John Comer. The judge rejects the request to make the trial political and Sergeant Kershaw is questioned about Donald's arrest. [S]

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: The Long Haired Leftie - Part 3. 1973. Stars David Calder & Bernard Brown. Donald spends a second day in the witness box cross examined by Andrew, who attempts to expose his radical politics. [S]

programme.title: The Man Who Wouldn't Talk
programme.desc: 1959. Crime. Director Herbert Wilcox. Stars Anna Neagle, Anthony Quaylea and Zsa Zsa Gabor. A barrister tries to defend her client, a U.S. scientist for killing his bride, who was a U.S. spy.

programme.title: Star Performance: Vote of Confidence
programme.desc: 1954. Drama. Director: William Asher. Stars David Niven & Amanda Blake. A recently freed conman tries to convince an heiress' secretary that he needs money to run an orphanage.

programme.title: Those British Faces
programme.desc: 1993. Documentary series that acts as a tribute to the greats of British cinema. This episode focuses on a wonderful tribute to Margaret Leighton. [S]

programme.title: The Cheaters
programme.desc: Fire! 1961. Stars John Ireland, Basil Dignam & Peter Elliott. An arsonist is on the loose in London, causing heavy losses for Eastern Insurance when a number of Stepney warehouses go up in flames. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Try, Try Again. 1976. Stars Jean Anderson, Richard Easton, Joby Blanshard. The Hammond Board has rejected Kirkman's offer but Brian feels that Hammonds need help if they are to function in Europe. [S]

programme.title: Travelling Man
programme.desc: Hustler. 1985. Stars Leigh Lawson, John Bird & Matthew Taylor. Lomax meets with his son Steve, but they run into trouble when Steve steals from a betting shop run by a local gang leader. [S]

programme.title: Time Without Pity
programme.desc: 1957. Crime. Director: Joseph Losey. Stars Michael Redgrave, Ann Todd, Leo McKern, Peter Cushing, Alec McCowan. David is an alcoholic who has 24 hours to save his son from being hanged for murder. [S]

programme.title: Bailout at 43,000
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Director: Francis D. Lyon. Stars John Payne, Karen Steele and Paul Kelly. The story of the men who volunteered to be test subjects for the new ejection system for a new bomber plane. [S]

programme.title: Bailout at 43,000
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Director: Francis D. Lyon. Stars John Payne, Karen Steele and Paul Kelly. The story of the men who volunteered to be test subjects for the new ejection system for a new bomber plane. [S]

programme.title: Crime of Passion
programme.desc: 1957. Drama. Directed by Gerd Oswald. Stars Barbara Stanwyck, Sterling Hayden & Raymond Burr. A police detective's ambitious wife will stop at nothing to help advance her husband's career. [S]

programme.title: Kings Go Forth
programme.desc: 1958. Drama. Directed by Delmer Daves. Stars Frank Sinatra, Tony Curtis & Natalie Wood. In France during WWII, two American soldiers become romantic rivals when they fall for the same woman. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: The Last Voyage
programme.desc: 1953. Drama. Directed by Robert Florey. Stars Charles Boyer, Jack Lambert & Walter Sande. A sea captain on his final voyage discovers that a time bomb has been planted on his ship.

programme.title: The Case of Charles Peace
programme.desc: 1949. Drama. Made at Merton Park Studios, based on a true story, directed by Norman Lee. The film recounts the exploits through the trial of Charles Peace. Starring Michael Martin-Harvey. [S]

programme.title: The Madame Gambles
programme.desc: 1951. Comedy. The owner of a dress shop gambles the shop away to her bookie who inherits, not only the shop, but the manager. Directed by Maclean Rogers. Starring Richard Hearne and Petula Clark. [S]

programme.title: Star Performance: The Collar
programme.desc: 1955. Drama. Directed by Roy Kellino. Stars David Niven, Barton MacLane & Walter Coy. A priest, held captive by a tribe, attempts to save their lives after they are threatened by the military.

programme.title: I Remember Mama
programme.desc: 1948. Drama. Starring Irene Dunne, Barbara Bel Geddes and Oskar Homolka. A Norwegian immigrant family in 1910, San Francisco... Mamma runs the Pennywise household. 5 Oscar Nominations. [S]

programme.title: Mon Oncle
programme.desc: 1958. Comedy. Directed by and stars Jacques Tati. With Jean-Pierre Zola & Lucien Frgis. Monsieur Hulot visits the technological world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but can't fit in. [S]

programme.title: Look At Life Clearway for Ships
programme.desc: 1966. A different look at the life of dredgers and how they prevent our waterways from silting up.

programme.title: The Writing on the Wall
programme.desc: Mike Read continues to explore the country to find the Blue Plaques and the unique stories behind them. This episode features Fred Perry, Herbert Chapman, Archibald Leitch and Mark Knopfler. [S]

programme.title: Miss Robin Hood
programme.desc: 1952. Comedy. Henry is a mild man who writes adventure stories for his girls. All is fine until he meets Miss Honey! Starring Richard Hearne & Margaret Rutherford. Directed by John Guillermin. [S]

programme.title: The Ghost Goes West
programme.desc: 1935. Comedy. Directed by Ren Clair. Stars Robert Donat, Jean Parker & Elsa Lanchester. A haunted Scottish castle is sold, dismantled and transported to Florida, bringing the ghost along with it. [S]

programme.title: The Disappearance of Flight 412
programme.desc: 1974. Sci-fi. Directed by Jud Taylor. Stars Glenn Ford & Bradford Dillman. When Flight 412 witnesses the disappearance of two fighter jets, a military group attempts to cover up the incident. [S]

programme.title: Strange But True
programme.desc: Past Life/Pluckley. 1996. Michael Aspel presents more unusual tales, including a man who searches for his other life and a look at Pluckley, believed to be the most haunted village in England. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: It's a dark night down in the Cellar Club but join Caroline Munro as she introduces the first offering of the night, the perplexing 1971 episode Doomwatch - The Logicians. [S]

programme.title: Doomwatch
programme.desc: The Logicians. 1971. Stars John Nolan & Irene Prador. A powerful antibiotic formula has been stolen near a school full of gifted teens. Are they responsible, and is computer technology to blame? [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: This cursed night continues with the mind bending 1972 horror Demons of the Mind, about the monsters that lurk and torture the agonised mind. Starring Shane Briant and Robert Hardy. [S]

programme.title: Demons of the Mind
programme.desc: 1972. Horror. Directed by Peter Sykes. Stars Shane Briant, Robert Hardy & Gillian Hills. Believing his family is cursed, a baron keeps his two children imprisoned following the death of his wife. [S]

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: Billy The Cowboy Hamster

programme.title: PJ Masks
